content_blocks.title: Advanced Topic Ahead

content.text: You're about to learn Timeline Analysis, an advanced technique used by real-world threat actors and security professionals. This knowledge is powerful and must be used ethically.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like learning advanced martial arts - powerful, but requires responsibility.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: This technique is actively used in real-world attacks and defenses.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: How would you use this knowledge to improve security?

content_blocks.title: Timeline Analysis

content.text: This lesson covers: Super timeline, Plaso, Log2timeline, Event correlation. These are advanced techniques requiring solid fundamentals.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Core concept: Super timeline enables attackers (or defenders) to reconstructing attack sequences.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Real threat actors use Timeline Analysis daily in active campaigns.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What security controls could prevent or detect this technique?

post_assessment.question: What is a super timeline?
options: Comprehensive timeline from all available artifacts
post_assessment.explanation: A super timeline combines ALL forensic artifacts (filesystem, registry, logs, etc.) into one chronological view.

post_assessment.question: Which tool creates super timelines?
post_assessment.explanation: Plaso (log2timeline) is the primary tool for creating comprehensive forensic timelines.
